languages.text: {n}Соломон буравит префекта тяжелым взглядом и медленно, точно его челюсти обратились в камень, выдавливает первое слово:{/n} "Я... приложил все силы и действовал исключительно во имя Лекс Империалис, но итоги миссии говорят сами за себя. Вердикт: моя эффективность в рамках дела Тассеры была недостаточной".

{n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон буравит префекта тяжелым взглядом и медленно, точно его челюсти обратились в камень, выдавливает первое слово:{/n} "Я... приложил все силы и действовал исключительно во имя Лекс Империалис, но итоги миссии говорят сами за себя. Вердикт: моя эффективность в рамках дела Тассеры была недостаточной".

My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

My verdict is thus that my efficiency in the Thassera case was below par."

My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

{n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

{n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes schwerer Blick fixiert die Präfektin, während er mühsam das erste Wort hervorstößt, als wären seine Kiefer zu Stein geworden.{/n} "Ich ... habe jede Anstrengung unternommen und ausschließlich im Namen des Lex Imperia gehandelt. Dennoch spricht das Resultat der Mission für sich. Mein Urteil lautet, dass meine Leistung im Fall Thassera ungenügend war."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes schwerer Blick fixiert die Präfektin, während er mühsam das erste Wort hervorstößt, als wären seine Kiefer zu Stein geworden.{/n} "Ich ... habe jede Anstrengung unternommen und ausschließlich im Namen des Lex Imperia gehandelt. Dennoch spricht das Resultat der Mission für sich. Mein Urteil lautet, dass meine Leistung im Fall Thassera ungenügend war."

languages.text: {n}Le regard lourd de Solomorne reste rivé sur la préfète alors qu'il se fait violence pour prendre la parole à son tour, comme si ses mâchoires s'étaient changées en pierre.{/n} « J'ai... j'ai fait tout mon possible, guidé en cela par la seule Lex Imperialis. Pour autant, le bilan de la mission parle de lui-même. En conséquence, force m'est de constater que mes performances dans l'affaire de Thassera étaient insuffisantes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard lourd de Solomorne reste rivé sur la préfète alors qu'il se fait violence pour prendre la parole à son tour, comme si ses mâchoires s'étaient changées en pierre.{/n} « J'ai... j'ai fait tout mon possible, guidé en cela par la seule Lex Imperialis. Pour autant, le bilan de la mission parle de lui-même. En conséquence, force m'est de constater que mes performances dans l'affaire de Thassera étaient insuffisantes. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙面色凝重，看着行政官的方向。他吃力地挤出了几句话，仿佛这些字句如同石头一般沉重。{/n}“我……尽了一切努力，完全依照帝国律法的规定行事。然而，这次行动的结果不言自明。因此，我的判断结果是，我在塔瑟拉的行动中存在失职行为。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙面色凝重，看着行政官的方向。他吃力地挤出了几句话，仿佛这些字句如同石头一般沉重。{/n}“我……尽了一切努力，完全依照帝国律法的规定行事。然而，这次行动的结果不言自明。因此，我的判断结果是，我在塔瑟拉的行动中存在失职行为。”

languages.text: {n}La mirada pesada de Solomorne permanece fija sobre la prefecta mientras se fuerza lentamente a sacar las palabras de su boca, como si se hubiera convertido en piedra.{/n} «Yo... me esforcé hasta el límite de mis capacidades y actué únicamente en nombre de la Lex Imperialis; no obstante, el resultado de la misión habla por sí solo. Así pues, mi veredicto es que mi rendimiento en el caso de Thassera ha sido insuficiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada pesada de Solomorne permanece fija sobre la prefecta mientras se fuerza lentamente a sacar las palabras de su boca, como si se hubiera convertido en piedra.{/n} «Yo... me esforcé hasta el límite de mis capacidades y actué únicamente en nombre de la Lex Imperialis; no obstante, el resultado de la misión habla por sí solo. Así pues, mi veredicto es que mi rendimiento en el caso de Thassera ha sido insuficiente».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは重い視線を総監に向け、まるで顎が石のように固まったかのように、ゆっくりと言葉を絞り出した。{/n}「私は…あらゆる努力を尽くし、レックス・インペリアの名のもとに行動しました。しかし、任務の結果が物語る通りです。したがって、タッセーラ事件における私の働きは不十分だったというのが私の判決です」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは重い視線を総監に向け、まるで顎が石のように固まったかのように、ゆっくりと言葉を絞り出した。{/n}「私は…あらゆる努力を尽くし、レックス・インペリアの名のもとに行動しました。しかし、任務の結果が物語る通りです。したがって、タッセーラ事件における私の働きは不十分だったというのが私の判決です」

languages.text: {n}Sert bakışlarıyla prefekte bakmakta olan Solomorne'un sanki taşa dönen ağzından yavaşça ilk kelimeler dökülüyor.{/n} "Ben... Elimden gelen her şeyi yaptım ve sadece Lex İmperialis adına hareket ettim. Görevin sonucu ortada. Bundan dolayı da Thassera meselesindeki performansımın yetersiz olduğu kanaatine vardım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's heavy gaze is fixed upon the prefect as he slowly forces the first word out of his jaws, as if they have turned to stone.{/n} "I... took every effort and was acting solely in the name of the Lex Imperialis; however, the outcome of the mission speaks for itself. My verdict is thus that my performance in the Thassera case was inadequate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sert bakışlarıyla prefekte bakmakta olan Solomorne'un sanki taşa dönen ağzından yavaşça ilk kelimeler dökülür.{/n} "Ben... Elimden gelen her şeyi yaptım ve sadece Lex İmperialis adına hareket ettim, lakin görevin sonucu ortada. Bundan dolayı da Thassera meselesindeki performansımın yetersiz olduğu kanaatıine vardım."
